Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support)

14 Jun 2022, 10:54 GMT+10

Hi Heath,

Good day!

Are we please able to take down the long weekend pop-up banner today, please? https://www.houseproud.com.au/

Thank you!

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

Jenn Nebres (Combinate Support)

10 Jun 2022, 09:33 GMT+10

Hi Heath,

The banner looks good.
Thank you very much for your assistance. I will pass this on to the client and let you know if we have feedback.

Regards,
Jenn

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

Wolf HQ Support

9 Jun 2022, 17:58 GMT+10

Hi Jen,

Sure, we have updated this for you.

Please note, we changed the reference to 'Monday' in this sentence:

Please use the online quote button below and we will respond on Monday.
To read 'Tuesday', i.e.:

Please use the online quote button below and we will respond on Tuesday.

Let us know if you need anything else.

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
support@wolfiq.com.au

full_threads.body:
##- Please type your reply above this line -##

Your request (#26060) has been received and is being reviewed by our support staff.

To add additional comments, reply to this email or click the link below:
https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/26060

Jenn Nebres (Combinate Support)

9 Jun 2022, 14:54 GMT+10

Hi team,

Our client, Houseproud is requesting to add a pop up banner to the website https://www.houseproud.com.au/ that lists the hours for the long weekend.

See below for the wording:

Houseproud will be closed from Friday 10 June at 5pm and reopen Tuesday 14 June at 9.00am. Please use the online quote button below and we will respond on Monday.

Instant Online Quote (button)

I believe they have a 2 hour development support in their plan. Can it cover the above request? If not, can you provide an estimate please?

Looking forward to your response.

Regards,
Jenn

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018
[MQ8O2W-00P9E]
